tools.image.imageTools.add_blurring(image: numpy.ndarray, box_width: int = 3, box_height: int = 3) → numpy.ndarray¶

Adds blur to an image with an averaging convolutional filter.

Parameters

  • img (np.ndarray) – Image array

  • box_width (int, optional) – Width of the convolutional filter, default = 3

  • box_height (int, optional) – Height of the convolutional filter, default = 3

Returns

Blurred image array

np.ndarray

  • noise_variance (int, optional) – Variance of the gaussian noise to be added, default = 25
